label: 執事
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: Under the Kamakura Bakufu, the headship of the monchūjo and the assistant headship of the mandokoro. Also, a high administrative position within various public and private central agencies.　[問注所、政所]　[Cf. Mass, 1976]
